strategy: Dark Mechanicus armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: All Battle Titan and Chaos Warhound formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army from the Traitor Titan Legions with Dark Mechanicus support.

sections.name: Battle Titan Formations
sections.description: Army may not mix Nurgle/Tzeentch or Slaanesh/Khorne formations.

formations.name: 0-1 Chaos Emperor Titan
formations.notes: * Choose one: Vicebringer Titan of Slaanesh, Gloombringer Titan of Nurgle, Strifebringer Titan of Khorne, or Changebringer Titan of Tzeentch

formations.name: Chaos Warlord Titan
formations.notes: * Choose one: Painlord Titan of Slaanesh, Plaguelord Titan of Nurgle, Banelord Titan of Khorne, or Warplord Titan of Tzeentch

formations.name: Chaos Reaver Titan
formations.notes: * Choose one: Reviler Titan of Slaanesh, Repugnant Titan of Nurgle, Ravager Titan of Khorne, or Mutator Titan of Tzeentch

sections.name: Support Formations
sections.description: Up to four for each Battle Titan. Army may not mix Nurgle/Tzeentch or Slaanesh/Khorne formations.

formations.name: Chaos Warhound
extraUnits: Add one Chaos Warhound of the same type: 225 points
formations.notes: * Choose one: Plaguehound of Nurgle, Bloodhound of Khorne, Warphound of Tzeentch, or Chaos Warhound of Chaos Undivided

formations.name: Slaanesh Scout Titan
extraUnits: Add one Slaanesh Scout Titan of the same type: 225 points
formations.notes: * Choose one: Subjugator of Slaanesh or Questor of Slaanesh

formations.name: Chaos Knight
formations.notes: * Choose one: 2 Hell-Scourges of Slaanesh, 2 Hell-Knights of Slaanesh, 2 Knight-Desecrators of Nurgle, 2 Knight-Rampagers of Khorne, 2 Knight-Despoilers of Tzeentch, or 2 Knight-Renegades of Chaos Undivided

sections.name: Hell-Forge and Chaos Navy Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Defiler Pack
extraUnits: Replace four Slaughterfiends with four Debasers of Slaanesh, four Desecrators of Nurgle, or four Defilers of Chaos Undivided: 25 points
Replace four Slaughterfiends with four Decievers of Tzeentch: 50 points

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points. Add one Lesser Daemon pool point for each Daemonic Pact.

upgrades.title: Traitor Titan Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

items.name: 0-1 Eye of the Gods
items.description: Adds an Eye of the Gods character to the formation.

items.name: Daemonic Herald
items.description: Adds an Daemonic Herald character to the formation. May not be combined with Eye of the Gods.
